column1: #Text=Katara says : " We 're safe Sokka , you can take off the mustache now . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Oh , no I ca n't .
#Text=I think you really did help those kids , you taught them to be free .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know , it was just a dance party , that 's all .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , that was some dance party Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Flamey - O sir , flamey - O. "
